item.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Easy, flourless cookies that require only 4 ingredients to make.
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients (12 servings):

  • 250g cashew butter
  • 100g monk fruit erythritol sweetener
  • 1 egg
  • 3 tbsp sugar-free dark chocolate chips
  • Pinch of salt (optional)
  • Pinch of salt (optional)

Process:

  1. Preheat oven to 180°C / 355 °F.
  2. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
  3. Add all ingredients, except chocolate chips, to a large mixing bowl and mix until combined.
  4. Fold in chocolate chips.
  5. Using your hands, roll and shape dough into 12 cookies. Place them on the lined baking tray.
  6. Transfer to oven and bake for 12 minutes or until golden brown.
  7. Remove cookies from oven and transfer to a cooling rack. Let cool completely before eating or storing. Enjoy!
